task.title: Managing recordings
task.shortdesc: Meetings that are recorded for meetings which you are the owner are displayed in the My Meetings list or from the main menu by tapping My Recordings.

context.p: If you are not the meeting owner, you do not see recordings for the meeting. Recording that are displayed in a meeting chat are there because the meeting owner shared the recording. When a recording is stopped, the meeting owner can choose to share the recording in the chat. You have access to this link until you leave the group chat. However, you can find the link in the recent meeting list.
Use the following steps to access recordings in the Recent Meeting page.

step.cmd: On the main menu, tap Meetings.
Select the Recent tab and find the meeting you attended which was recorded.
Swipe right on the meeting and click the menu icon ().
step.info: If the meeting owner shared the recording with the attendees, it is listed. To see a list of recent meetings with recordings, tap the filter icon in the bottom left corner of the screen then tap Filtered by Recordings .
